name: FestivAndes
description: Transactional application used to handle the business activities of a theater festival, such as ticket selling and logistical operations.
technologies: JDBC, Oracle Data Base, WildFly 10.x, Rabbit MQ

name: Habitaciones
description: Web application used to coordinate transactional operations for renting, rooms, houses and apartments.
technologies: JPA, JAX-RS, Glassfish, Maven, Jenkins, JQuery

name: AMVA - Mapa de Riesgos Quimicos
description: Web application for the management and assesment of Chemical industries which presented a potential risk for the community, by using geografical visualizations and constructing dynamical queries.

name: Minning Management
description: IoT application for the health, security and eviromental management of a Colombian carbon mine.
technologies: Cassandra DB, MongoBD, Kafka, Node-Red, JQuery, Web sockets,

name: JDB & RESTful Application Tutorial
description: Tutorial used to teach students how to create a web application using REST protocols and a Java Data Base Conections.
